Detailed Description

Defined constants for the various paths the app uses

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum BASE_DIR

The base directory of the application

enum DATA_ROOT

Data directory, all modules should place configuration files and databases at this location

enum MODULES_ROOT

Modules directory

enum UPLOADS_ROOT

Uploads directory, every upload should be placed at the location pointed by this string
